#summary OOSTethtys JAVA Server Toolkit



= OOSTethys - Sensor Observation Service (SOS) Toolkit =

OOSTethys JAVA Toolkit creates an OGC-compliant Sensor Observation Service (SOS) from sources that could be read by the UNIDATA NetCDF Java API. Sources include NetCDF files and OpenDAP servers. Links:

The [JavaServerInstructions instructions] page will help you getting started and have an SOS service running in less than 10 min

The [JavaServerNewAndNoteworthy new and noteworthy] presents  summary of what is new for each release.
